Author: CrisF#3405
Content:
FYI:  Hi, back in December I managed to loose some KMD.  After all of this time I've finally figured out what I did.
Posting so hopefully others won't make the same mistake, and to make it easier for support if someone comes in with a similar problem.
At the time I was consolidating funds to send.  Using `z_sendmany` and `z_mergetoaddress`.
On one of the `z_mergetoaddress`es I put an amount at the end of the command, as I had been doing for `z_sendmany`.
Unfortunately, in  this case, a number at the end of `z_mergetoaddress` is the miners fee ü§¶ 
Not a good idea to rush through things and get complacent!
 61c5432c68d6d829a7adbd8f4de8b485c8b5a34869e397090538311c44e3e3f4
Please don't make the same mistake I did!

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @CrisF that tx has a normal tx fee

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Oh, Might have put up the wrong tx?  Will check when back.  Isn't that the 300kmd miners fee one?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: that is 299.9999 being sent to a z address as far as I can tell

Author: Terran#7829
Content: Hi, I just logged onto my Agama wallet for the first time in like 6 months, and all my KMD is gone. And the wallet says there is no history transactions. It also says it can't connect to a server? Does it show "0" KMD balance because it needs to connect, or I need to update the Agama wallet? OR have I just been straight up robbed

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: which Agama version you are using @Terran ?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: use the latest version 0.3.4 from here https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-wallets

Author: Terran#7829
Content: version v.0.2.06c-beta

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you must upgrade. use the link above

Author: Terran#7829
Content: ok, thanks. Will that give me my coins back?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: your coins are not lost.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: yes, you will get them back as long as you update and use the seed that generates your address with funds

Author: Terran#7829
Content: that's a huge relief, I'm downloading it now. I hope I do! Thanks

Author: Terran#7829
Content: does it matter if I download the new version of agama on a different computer and use the seed to get onto my account?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: nope, it doesn't matter. you can use any computer or a mobile device. same seed will aways bring same address and the funds in it

Author: Terran#7829
Content: ok I just used my seed to log on, and it still says 0 balance.. and with no transaction history.. I don't know what the hell is going on :/

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: does the displayed address matches with the one you had funds in?

Author: Terran#7829
Content: I never wrote down the public address of the wallet .. I only wrote down the seed

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: if you change the seed, even a single word or space mismatch, you will get differnet address

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: different address means your funds are not there

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you should check your seed and the source of your funding.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: check this post for more info https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000024514-common-wallet-issues

Author: Terran#7829
Content: i got on, I must have not been typing the seed exactly correctly. thank you for your help

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: nice to hear. do you see your balance now?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: keep a record of the address as well now

@Lumbi sounds lile this https://github.com/kyuupichan/electrumx/issues/185
you need to compact the electrumx database regularly... how often depends on the coin
